★ Release Notes: 2022-07-28 ★
≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡

Thanks for upgrading to the latest version of the ALKS CLI!

* Adds logs for debugging secret values obtained from prompts and keystores (only prints length unless --unsafe-verbose flag is passed)

Have feedback? https://github.com/Cox-Automotive/ALKS-CLI/issues

☁☁☁☁☁☁  Happy Clouding! ☁☁☁☁☁☁
